noLikesYetText: Keep discovering and your cosmic matches will find you!
compatibilitySubtitle: Deep dive into your cosmic connection
emotionalDesc: Your Moon signs create a deep emotional bond. You understand each other's needs intuitively.
communicationDesc: Mercury aspects suggest lively conversations with occasional misunderstandings to work through.
passionDesc: Venus-Mars aspects indicate strong physical chemistry and romantic attraction.
longTermDesc: Saturn aspects suggest a relationship that can stand the test of time with commitment.
valuesDesc: Jupiter placements show aligned beliefs and a shared vision for the future.
growthDesc: Pluto aspects indicate this relationship will transform you both in meaningful ways.
goodCompatibility: Strong potential for a meaningful relationship.
growthCompatibility: This pairing offers opportunities for growth and learning.
adviceText: Focus on open communication during Mercury retrograde periods. Plan romantic activities during Venus transits for maximum connection. Your composite chart suggests Sunday evenings are ideal for quality time together.
standOutDesc: Your profile appears at the top of their stack
higherMatchRateDesc: Super Likes are 3x more likely to result in a match
showInterestDesc: Let them know you really like them before matching
priorityNotificationDesc: They get a special notification about your Super Like
superLikesRefresh: Super Likes refresh daily at midnight
swipeUpDesc: Or tap the star icon on a profile you love
theyGetNotifiedDesc: Your profile appears with a special star highlight
higherChanceDesc: They know you're truly interested, increasing match probability
superLikeTip1: Use Super Likes on profiles with high compatibility scores
superLikeTip2: Read their bio carefully before using a Super Like
superLikeTip3: Super Like at optimal times (evenings tend to work best)
superLikeTip4: Save Super Likes for profiles that truly resonate with you
topOfInboxDesc: Your message appears first in their chat list
specialHighlightDesc: Priority messages have a distinctive purple glow
higherResponseDesc: Premium members respond more to priority messages
readReceiptsDesc: Know when your message has been read
startersSubtitle: Use these astrology-based openers for better results
starter1: I noticed we're both fire signs! What's your take on sign compatibility?
starter2: Your Moon in Scorpio caught my eye. I bet you have amazing intuition!
starter3: Our Venus signs are a perfect match. Want to explore what that means?
starter4: I love that we share similar cosmic energy. What drew you to astrology?
photosHint: Add up to 6 photos. First photo is your main profile picture.
removePhotoConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this photo?
bioHint: Share what makes you unique. Mention your interests, values, or what you're looking for.
tip1: Use clear, recent photos that show your face
tip2: A complete profile gets 3x more matches
tip3: Be specific about your interests to find better matches
deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. All your data, matches, and messages will be permanently deleted.
typeDeleteConfirm: Please confirm you want to delete your account.
deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again or contact support.
logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
elementFilterHint: Select elements to filter by their zodiac signs
zodiacFilterHint: Only show profiles with these sun signs
noBlockedUsersText: You haven't blocked anyone yet. When you block someone, they'll appear here.
unblockConfirm: Are you sure you want to unblock {{name}}?
blockInfo: Blocked users cannot see your profile, send you messages, or match with you.
cosmicSummaryText: As a {{sun}} Sun with {{moon}} Moon and {{rising}} Rising, you possess a unique blend of energies. Your Sun drives your conscious self, your Moon nurtures your emotional world, and your Rising shapes how you navigate life's journey.
sunInAries: Your Sun in Aries makes you a natural leader with pioneering spirit. You approach life with courage and enthusiasm, always ready to take on new challenges. Your identity is tied to being first, being bold, and blazing trails for others to follow.
sunInTaurus: With your Sun in Taurus, you embody stability and sensuality. You find your identity through building lasting things - relationships, homes, careers. Your approach to life is patient and methodical, valuing quality over quantity.
sunInGemini: Your Gemini Sun gives you a curious, adaptable nature. You identify with being the communicator, the connector of ideas and people. Your mind is quick and versatile, always seeking new information and experiences.
sunInCancer: With the Sun in Cancer, your identity is deeply connected to home, family, and emotional security. You are naturally nurturing and protective, with strong intuitive abilities that guide your path through life.
sunInLeo: Your Leo Sun makes you naturally magnetic and creative. You identify with being a source of warmth and inspiration to others. Your life purpose involves creative self-expression and leading with your heart.
sunInVirgo: With your Sun in Virgo, you find identity through service and improvement. You have a keen eye for detail and a desire to be useful. Your life purpose involves analyzing, healing, and perfecting.
sunInLibra: Your Libra Sun gives you a strong sense of justice and beauty. You identify with being a peacemaker and connector. Your life purpose involves creating harmony and bringing people together.
sunInScorpio: With the Sun in Scorpio, you have a deep, transformative nature. You identify with going beneath the surface to uncover hidden truths. Your life purpose involves transformation and regeneration.
sunInSagittarius: Your Sagittarius Sun makes you a natural philosopher and explorer. You identify with the quest for meaning and truth. Your life purpose involves expanding horizons - both physical and mental.
sunInCapricorn: With your Sun in Capricorn, you identify with achievement and mastery. You are naturally ambitious and disciplined, with a strong sense of responsibility. Your life purpose involves building something lasting.
sunInAquarius: Your Aquarius Sun gives you a unique, progressive nature. You identify with being different and ahead of your time. Your life purpose involves innovation and humanitarian progress.
sunInPisces: With the Sun in Pisces, you have a deeply compassionate and artistic nature. You identify with the interconnectedness of all things. Your life purpose involves healing, creativity, and spiritual growth.
moonInAries: Your Moon in Aries gives you passionate, fiery emotions. You need excitement and action to feel emotionally fulfilled. You process feelings quickly and directly, preferring to confront issues head-on.
moonInTaurus: With your Moon in Taurus, you have deep emotional needs for security and comfort. You process feelings slowly and need time to adjust to changes. Sensual pleasures and material stability soothe your soul.
moonInGemini: Your Gemini Moon makes you emotionally versatile and communicative. You need mental stimulation to feel emotionally balanced. Talking through your feelings helps you process them.
moonInCancer: With the Moon in its home sign of Cancer, your emotional nature is powerful and intuitive. You have deep needs for nurturing and being nurtured. Your moods are influenced by those around you.
moonInLeo: Your Leo Moon gives you a generous, warm emotional nature. You need appreciation and recognition to feel emotionally secure. Creative expression is essential for your emotional well-being.
moonInVirgo: With your Moon in Virgo, you process emotions through analysis and problem-solving. You need order and usefulness to feel emotionally balanced. Helping others soothes your soul.
moonInLibra: Your Libra Moon gives you a strong need for harmony in relationships. You process emotions through relating to others. Beauty and balance are essential for your emotional well-being.
moonInScorpio: With the Moon in Scorpio, you have intense, deep emotions. You need emotional authenticity and depth in relationships. You process feelings through transformation and letting go.
moonInSagittarius: Your Sagittarius Moon gives you an optimistic emotional nature. You need freedom and adventure to feel emotionally fulfilled. Philosophy and humor help you process difficult feelings.
moonInCapricorn: With your Moon in Capricorn, you have controlled, reserved emotions. You need achievement and structure to feel secure. You process feelings through work and practical action.
moonInAquarius: Your Aquarius Moon gives you a detached, intellectual approach to emotions. You need freedom and friendship to feel emotionally balanced. You process feelings through understanding them objectively.
moonInPisces: With the Moon in Pisces, you have boundless compassion and sensitivity. You need spiritual connection and creative outlets. You absorb others' emotions easily and need time alone to recharge.
risingInAries: With Aries Rising, you come across as confident, direct, and energetic. People see you as a leader and pioneer. You approach new situations with courage and enthusiasm.
risingInTaurus: Your Taurus Rising gives you a calm, grounded presence. Others see you as reliable and sensual. You approach life at your own steady pace, valuing comfort and beauty.
risingInGemini: With Gemini Rising, you appear curious, witty, and versatile. People see you as communicative and youthful. You approach life with mental agility and adaptability.
risingInCancer: Your Cancer Rising gives you a nurturing, protective presence. Others see you as caring and emotionally intuitive. You approach new situations with sensitivity and caution.
risingInLeo: With Leo Rising, you have a magnetic, dramatic presence. People see you as confident and creative. You approach life as if you're on stage, naturally drawing attention.
risingInVirgo: Your Virgo Rising gives you a modest, helpful presence. Others see you as analytical and detail-oriented. You approach life with practicality and a desire to be useful.
risingInLibra: With Libra Rising, you appear charming, diplomatic, and balanced. People see you as fair and aesthetically minded. You approach life seeking harmony and partnership.
risingInScorpio: Your Scorpio Rising gives you an intense, mysterious presence. Others sense your depth and power. You approach life with penetrating awareness and emotional intensity.
risingInSagittarius: With Sagittarius Rising, you appear optimistic, adventurous, and philosophical. People see you as fun-loving and wise. You approach life as a grand adventure.
risingInCapricorn: Your Capricorn Rising gives you a serious, ambitious presence. Others see you as responsible and mature. You approach life with determination and long-term vision.
risingInAquarius: With Aquarius Rising, you appear unique, friendly, and progressive. People see you as independent and innovative. You approach life as an individual, not following the crowd.
risingInPisces: Your Pisces Rising gives you a dreamy, compassionate presence. Others see you as artistic and spiritually inclined. You approach life with imagination and sensitivity.
dominantFire: With a dominance of Fire in your chart, you are naturally enthusiastic, creative, and action-oriented. You lead with passion and inspire others with your energy and vision.
dominantEarth: With a dominance of Earth in your chart, you are practical, grounded, and reliable. You build things that last and approach life with patience and determination.
dominantAir: With a dominance of Air in your chart, you are intellectual, communicative, and social. You process life through ideas and connections, always seeking understanding.
dominantWater: With a dominance of Water in your chart, you are emotional, intuitive, and empathetic. You navigate life through feelings and have deep psychological insight.
dominantCardinal: With a dominance of Cardinal signs, you are an initiator and leader. You start new projects and inspire action in others. Change and new beginnings energize you.
dominantFixed: With a dominance of Fixed signs, you are determined, persistent, and reliable. Once you commit to something, you see it through. Stability and loyalty define you.
dominantMutable: With a dominance of Mutable signs, you are adaptable, flexible, and versatile. You handle change well and can see multiple perspectives. You are the editors and refiners of the zodiac.
premiumPlusSubtitle: Complete astrology experience with daily guidance
dailyHoroscopeDesc: Personalized daily readings based on your chart
monthlyHoroscopeDesc: Detailed monthly forecasts and important dates
retrogradeAlertsDesc: Get notified before Mercury retrograde and more
luckyDaysDesc: Know your best days for love, career, and more
dailyOverviewContent: Today brings powerful cosmic energy for {{sign}}. The stars align to support your personal growth and relationships. Trust your intuition and stay open to unexpected opportunities.
dailyLoveContent: Venus aspects bring harmony to your romantic life. Singles may encounter someone special, while couples deepen their connection. Express your feelings openly.
dailyCareerContent: Mercury enhances your communication skills at work. A financial opportunity may present itself. Stay focused on your long-term goals.
dailyHealthContent: Your energy levels are high today. Perfect time for physical activity or starting a new wellness routine. Listen to your body's needs.
dailyLuckyContent: The cosmos favor bold decisions today. Your lucky numbers resonate with prosperity energy. Wear your power colors for extra confidence.
affirmationContent: I am aligned with the universe's abundant energy. Today, I attract love, success, and positive experiences into my life.
monthlyOverviewContent: This month brings transformative energy for {{sign}}. Major planetary shifts create opportunities for personal and professional growth. Focus on building foundations that will support your future aspirations.
weekAdvice1: The new moon energy supports fresh starts. Set intentions for what you want to manifest this month.
weekAdvice2: Your efforts gain traction. Stay consistent with your goals and watch progress unfold.
weekAdvice3: Mid-month brings a time to reassess. Make adjustments where needed and stay flexible.
weekAdvice4: Reap the rewards of your efforts. Celebrate your achievements and prepare for the next cycle.
venusEntersDesc: Love and finances receive a boost. Excellent time for romantic gestures and investments.
fullMoonDesc: Emotions run high. A time of completion and revelation. Trust the process.
mercuryRetroDesc: Communication may be tricky. Double-check details and avoid signing contracts if possible.
newMoonDesc: Perfect time for setting new intentions. Plant seeds for future growth.
planetaryTransitsSubtitle: Real-time cosmic influences on your life
sunTransitDesc: The Sun illuminates your sense of self and life purpose. This transit brings vitality and clarity to your goals.
moonTransitDesc: The Moon moves through nurturing Cancer, heightening emotional sensitivity and the need for comfort and security.
mercuryTransitDesc: Mercury in Capricorn brings practical, structured thinking. Good time for planning and serious conversations.
venusTransitDesc: Venus in dreamy Pisces enhances romance, compassion, and artistic appreciation. Love takes on a spiritual quality.
marsTransitDesc: Mars in Gemini creates scattered but versatile energy. Multiple projects may compete for your attention.
jupiterTransitDesc: Jupiter in Taurus expands opportunities for financial growth and material comfort. Slow and steady wins.
saturnTransitDesc: Saturn in Pisces asks you to bring structure to your dreams and spiritual practices.
mercuryAquariusImpact: Innovative thinking and unique ideas flow freely
marsCancerImpact: Energy focused on home and emotional security
venusAriesImpact: Bold moves in love and passionate new attractions
transitTip1: Green (Harmonious) - Supportive energy, take advantage of opportunities
transitTip2: Yellow (Neutral) - Mixed energy, stay flexible and adaptable
mercuryDo3: Back up your data and devices
alertHint: Enable notifications to receive alerts before each retrograde begins
survivalTip1: • Retrogrades are not inherently negative - they're times for reflection, review, and revision.
survivalTip2: • The shadow periods before and after are equally important for preparation and integration.
survivalTip3: • Use this time to slow down, revisit old projects, and tie up loose ends.
loveDaysDesc: These days are cosmically aligned for romance, dating, and deepening relationships.
careerDaysDesc: Optimal days for job interviews, presentations, and career moves.
moneyDaysDesc: Favorable days for financial decisions, investments, and negotiations.
healthDaysDesc: Best days to start new health routines or make wellness changes.
creativityDaysDesc: Peak days for artistic expression, brainstorming, and creative projects.
luckyTip1: Plan important events on your lucky days for better outcomes
luckyTip2: The lucky hour amplifies the positive energy - use it wisely
luckyTip3: Even on non-lucky days, your attitude determines your success
trialExhaustedDesc: You've used your free daily preview. Subscribe for unlimited access.
verificationEmailSent: We sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
enterYourEmail: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
resetEmailSentDesc: We sent a password reset link to your email. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.
passwordUpdatedDesc: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now sign in with your new password.
socialAuthError: Social sign-in failed. Please try again.
sessionExpiredDesc: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
